title: Updated Apple Developer Program License Agreement now available
description: Attachment 2 of the Apple Developer Program License Agreement has been amended to specify requirements for use of the In-App Purchase API. Please review the changes and accept the updated terms in your account.View the full terms and conditionsTranslations of the updated agreement will be available on the Apple Developer website within one month.

text: Updated Apple Developer Program License Agreement now available December 6, 2024 Attachment 2 of the Apple Developer Program License Agreement has been amended to specify requirements for use of the In-App Purchase API. Please review the changes and accept the updated terms in your account.View the full terms and conditionsTranslations of the updated agreement will be available on the Apple Developer website within one month.
html:
Updated Apple Developer Program License Agreement now available

December 6, 2024

Attachment 2 of the Apple Developer Program License Agreement has been amended to specify requirements for use of the In-App Purchase API. Please review the changes and accept the updated terms in your account.

View the full terms and conditions

Translations of the updated agreement will be available on the Apple Developer website within one month.
